name: Sourdough
description: A classic sourdough bread with a tangy flavor and chewy texture.

name: Baguette
description: A long, thin loaf with a crispy crust and soft interior.

name: Multigrain
description: A hearty bread made with a variety of grains and seeds.

name: Ciabatta
description: An Italian bread with a soft, chewy texture and holes throughout.

name: Focaccia
description: A flat bread with a soft, fluffy texture and a variety of toppings.

name: Rye
description: A dense, hearty bread made with rye flour and caraway seeds.
